```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
library(farsPackage)
```
Overview
The farsPackage provides a set of functions to read, process, and visualize data from the Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS). This package is useful for analyzing traffic accident data across different years and states.

Reading FARS Data
Use fars_read() to read a FARS CSV file:

```{r}

fars_read("accident_2013.csv.bz2") # Uncomment if file is available
```
